TopicTitle: can not put a maneuver nod in career mode

Articles.Content:
Hey guys. I can in ksp in snabox mode and in science mode the periapsis is blue and can set a maneuver nod . Only in careers mode the periapsis is gray and it a pleasure to do anything to it

Edited August 3, 2016 by raisky
Until you upgrade the Tracking Station a couple times you don't get maneuver node functionality.

14 minutes ago, TwinKerbal said:

Until you upgrade the Tracking Station a couple times you don't get maneuver node functionality.

To be more specific, you need to upgrade the Tracking Station to level 2 as well as Mission Control to level 2 before you can place maneuver nodes in career mode.

You can right click the buildings from the career "home" screen to access the upgrade menus.

The Tracking Station level 2 is 225,000 Funds, Mission Control level 2 is only 75,000 Funds. Together that's 300,000 Funds to unlock maneuver nodes.

Edited August 3, 2016 by Rocket In My Pocket
